items.sentence: Tom was talking about the delicious food they had eaten on their trip.
Tom was very attached to the golf clubs that his father had given him.
Tom wished there was more than just one strawberry in his fruit salad.
Just because Tom provoked you doesn\'t give you a right to attack him.
I have always fed my dog the dog food that comes in the big green bag.
I imagine that Tom will eventually give up and let someone else do it.
It\'s doubtful whether Tom can speak French well enough to do the job.
It\'s unlikely that anyone besides Tom would consider taking that job.
Just to be on the safe side, why don\'t you take an umbrella with you?
Let me give you several other reasons why you shouldn\'t go to Boston.
Many people who hear Tom speaking French think he\'s a native speaker.
I want to go back to doing what I was doing before you interrupted me.
She handed him his jacket then opened the door and asked him to leave.
The baritone sax that Tom wanted to buy was way too expensive for him.
There is an urgent need for the local government to help the homeless.
Tom didn\'t think he\'d ever have a chance to live in another country.
Tom didn\'t want to see Mary in prison for a crime she didn\'t commit.
Tom doesn\'t need to answer any more questions if he doesn\'t want to.
Can you describe to me the difference between black tea and green tea?
The suspect was last seen wearing blue jeans and an orange sweatshirt.
